turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to file an insurance claim. My car was damaged in a hit-and-run.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I am sorry to hear about your car. I can certainly help you with filing a claim. To begin, can you please provide your policy number?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, it's ABC123XYZ. This is so frustrating, I can't believe someone just drove off!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. Thank you for providing your policy number. Can you please describe the damage to your vehicle and the date and time of the incident?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Well, the back bumper is completely smashed. It happened last night around 8 pm. I was parked on Elm Street. I filed a police report too. Report number is 2024-07-26-0042.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you for the information. Please provide photos of the damage, if available.  Also, please confirm your address is 123 Main St, Anytown, USA?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yes, that's correct. I've uploaded photos of the damage. But, um, what about the police report? Do I have to send that separately or is it linked automatically?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you for the photos. The police report is not automatically linked. You must submit the police report separately. Please upload a copy through our online portal. Or you can mail it to our claims processing center. The address is available on the website. I can also send you a link.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Alright, I'll upload it online. What's the estimated timeline for this claim to be processed and how can I follow up if I don't hear anything?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: We aim to process claims within 7-10 business days, but the exact time can vary based on the complexity of the situation and the volume of claims we're receiving. You can check the status through our online portal using your claim number, or you can contact our claims department directly at 555-CLAIM.
